MODULE.name: AUDPROC_MODULE_ID_TX_IIR_FILTER
MODULE.description:
ID of the IIR Tuning Filter module on the Tx path.
This#[ #] module supports the following parameter IDs:
- #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_TX_IIR_FILTER_ENABLE_CONFIG
- #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_TX_IIR_FILTER_PRE_GAIN
-#[ #] #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_TX_IIR_FILTER_CONFIG_PARAMS
- #AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_ENABLE

PARAMETER.name: AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_TX_IIR_FILTER_ENABLE_CONFIG
PARAMETER.description: Structure for enabling the configuration#[ #] parameter for the IIR filter module on the Tx path.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: enable_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether the IIR tuning filter is enabled.

PARAMETER.name: AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_TX_IIR_FILTER_PRE_GAIN
PARAMETER.description: Structure for the pregain parameter for the IIR filter#[ #] module on the Tx path.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Clients must set this field to 0.

PARAMETER.name: AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_TX_IIR_FILTER_CONFIG_PARAMS
PARAMETER.description:
ID of the Tx IIR Filter Configuration parameters#[ #] used by AUDPROC_MODULE_ID_TX_IIR_FILTER.
This structure is followed by the IIR filter coefficients on the Tx path as follows:
- Sequence of int32#[ #] ulFilterCoeffs -- Each band has five coefficients, each in int32 format in the order of b0, b1, b2, a1, a2.
- Sequence of int16 sNumShiftFactor --#[ #] One int16 per band. The numerator shift factor is related to the Q factor of the filter coefficients.
- Sequence of uint16 usPanSetting -- One#[ #] uint16 for each band to indicate if the filter is applied to left (0), center (1), and right (2) channels.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Clients must set this field to 0.
